medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient developed abdominal pain while in the hospital with worsening pain today, predominantly right-sided, radiating diffusely to the back, and sharp at its worst. No diarrhea, constipation, nausea, vomiting, fevers, or chills were reported.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, Hyperlipidemia, Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus, Chronic Kidney Disease stage III, heart block status post pacemaker, adrenal mass with possible Cushing's syndrome, gastroesophageal reflux disease, glaucoma, obesity, total abdominal hysterectomy and bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy years ago.
medical_history.family_history: Brother with unspecified condition. Another brother died of prostate cancer and a sister died of gastric cancer.
